reviews.title: rrbazarraga
reviews.description: Hi My name is Anthony Azarraga and I wanted to say that Dr Robert Yavrouian is one of the best colorectal surgeon out there! Let me start by saying He is My hero who saved me from loosing my life through stage 3 colorectal cancer, I met him because I worked with him for a while so I’ve known him for a bit now not knowing that one day I will need his god gifted hands to cure me and saved my life, when I found out from the ER doctor that they felt a mass I message him and he responded to me immediately as I told him what I found out and it’s very concerning health issues, after doing all the test and scans and we are sure that It’s cancer growing inside me he told me that everything will be alright that he can saved me those words gave me hope and when he said that he can saved me I believe him because I felt it I know that he is true and genuine doctor and I trust him with my life, I know how good he his as a doctor because I work with him for quite a bit now. he is the best I’m not saying this because I worked with him I’m saying this because he gave my life back to me, because of him I’m alive and having dinner with my wife and because of him I get to see my son graduate in college and will get to see pursue his dreams, with his gods given talent he did my surgery and make sure that everything will be Ok, he is very good and I’m his living proof that cancer can be treated!!!! Thank you so much for everything Dr Yavrouian I will never forget your kindness and your knowledge!! ! This is the  doctor that I would want for my family and love ones! A doctor you can trust!!!the picture is the day of my surgery and present, I’m now back to work and do a lot of ourdoor cycling as a hobby!!!

reviews.title: Grandpa Moses
reviews.description: Dr. Yavrouian and his staff are fantastic. He truly cares about your well being and gives his valuable time and attentiveness. I couldn't have asked for a better doctor or surgeon. I'm so fortunate and grateful to have him and his staff on my side.

reviews.title: Ela Ahmady
reviews.description: It was my first visit, Dr Yavrouian had a very bad attitude and I felt so disrespected, while he left me half naked bend on the bed in the middle of the visit on a cold room for about 15 minutes!On the other hand, it was not easy to make an appointment, they required past Colonoscopy record even for new patients. I arrived on time for my appointment and I had to wait long to become my turn. I got call to schedule a new colonoscopy, I have a good PPO insurance, buy out of pocket was estimated for $1,700!! they did not offer any help to research potentially lowering the cost. I honestly don’t have a positive experience with this place and Dr Robert. I don’t know where these 4.5/5 start come from.

reviews.title: Meredith W
reviews.description: Dr.Yavrouian saved my life. It has been a full year and half since my colostomy reversal. I am so grateful to him and all the care I was so lucky to have. I was always treated with respect and my comfort and any concerns were never an issue, even the 3 times I called him the week before my last surgery being that I had such a  challenging year with my health. He was patient, kind, understanding, and most importantly, skillful. I am thankful everyday for my experience with Dr. Yavrouian.

reviews.title: Emily Baghdasarian
reviews.description: Dr. Yavrouian and the staff are great! Dr. Yavrouian is a great doctor that cares about his patients and is extremely attentive. I highly recommend his office!

reviews.title: Nasrin Rad
reviews.description: Overall I had a very good experience with Dr Yavrouian. The doctor took very well care of me before and after the procedure. He gave me a plan on how to take care of myself after I went into surgery and I followed with that plan and my results ended up being so good. I had minor pain the first couple of days which he warned me about but I ended up going through the first couple of days with a little bit of pain and it went away. The experience with this doctor for me was very awesome and a experience that left a good memory for me and I will definitely be coming back to him if I ever need be. The doctor has a very great attitude and a very warm welcoming personality thank you Dr Yavourian

reviews.title: Edmund Safatian
reviews.description: I had to have surgery, and I was really hesitant as I get very nervous and anxious with any medical procedure.Dr. Yavrouian made me feel very comfortable, from the office visits to the day of surgery. He did an exceptional job all the way through.  I am now completely healed and feeling great.Thank you Dr. Yavrouian

reviews.title: Yelena Sanamyan
reviews.description: 5 stars are not enough to describe Dr. Yavrouian and the kind of physician that he is. I’ve had the pleasure of working alongside Dr. Yavrouian for years and have not met another doctor  who’s more compassionate and caring. Therefore, when it came to myself needing surgery it was a very easy decision to choose him. I had the utmost conference that he would take great care of me and he did not disappoint. From seeing me in the office and  going over my options all the way to the operating room my experience was nothing but pleasant. He’s calm and collected, very professional, never rushes through anything and takes all the time to answer any questions and/or concerns. My recovery was nearly painless and the scarring was minimal. I’m grateful for having him as my doctor and for making this an amazing experience for me.

reviews.title: Don Carnevale
reviews.description: Wonderful talented surgeon.  You can rest assured you've found the best doctor.

reviews.title: Ryan Okabe
reviews.description: Dr. Yav is the best colorectal surgeon in Southern California.  His staff is wonderful and his pricing was very reasonable for the quality of work.

reviews.title: Ryan Okabe
reviews.description: Dr. Yav is the best colorectal surgeon in Southern California.  His staff is wonderful and his pricing was very reasonable for the quality of work.

reviews.title: Zara Piliposyan
reviews.description: Dr Robert Yavrouian Is one of the best colorectal surgeons!!! He is providing customize patient care and is very knowledgeable. I am very satisfied with the care he provided and the procedure he did. I am forever thankful to him!!In addition for being a great Surgen he’s a good person with a great heart, he is very caring, calm and patiently answers all the questions.He is super doctor!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.title: Aghavni Yeghiazaryan
reviews.description: Dr. Yavrouian is one of the best surgeons out there. I definitely recommend him. Dr. Yavrouian and his team are very attentive and knowledgeable. They respond quickly and are always willing to help with any concerns the patient may have.

reviews.title: meline khachatoorian
reviews.description: We had a very good experience with doctor Robert Yavrouian he just did a surgery for my dad and everything was perfect and he is a very nice and kind person and he answered all my questions patiently.I had a emergency question yesterday and he personally called me back and answered my questions.His office staff are so kind and friendly also .

reviews.title: Z
reviews.description: Came here last year and its not a good drs office. First the front reception staff wasn't wearing masks when I was there and are very grumpy for some reason and speaking some other languge behind your back.This dr has zero compassion and doesn't seem to really care about his patients as he has so many waiting to see him . He basically rushes you out the door. He seems mentally checked out because he is so booked with patients that he just asks a few questions and then offers a painful surgery without any other options.I got hurt during a procedure here last year but never left a comment til today. I would not recommend Dr Robert yavrouian ! You've been warned ⚠️.

reviews.title: Nina Yaftali
reviews.description: I come from a long standing family history of MDs, and Dr. Yavrouian far exceeded my expectations. My surgery went flawless, my recovery time was minimal, and I had little to no pain issues post-operatively.  Dr. Yavrouian has great bedside manner, is very caring, and took good care of me throughout the whole process. I would highly recommend him to any of my friends, family, or colleagues, as he is one of the best surgeons in Los Angeles.

reviews.title: Vartuhi Torosyan
reviews.description: I wound up in the ER at Glendale Adventist, with a painful, angry, infected abscess.  Dr. Yavrouian was the attending surgeon at the time. I am so thankful I was under his care. He performed an incision and drainage procedure despite it being New Year's eve, and follow up post surgery on New Year's Day! The procedure went very well, with no  complications. He was very thorough and patient with addressing all my concerns. Furthermore, he was responsive in addressing all my questions and concerns  with the weeks following the procedure, as recovery took several weeks. I highly recommend Dr. Yavrouian for his expertise, patience,  and kindness.

reviews.title: mark haushalter
reviews.description: Looking for a colorectal surgeon?  These doctors are extremely well known.  Look no further for top service and value for your medical needs!!

reviews.title: Circle Flying H
reviews.description: Dr. Yavrouian was very professional and passionate about the FT procedure he offered my elderly mother who was suffering very badly with the dreaded CDiff. My only regret is that they didn’t keep her overnight as she was quite frail going into the procedure and it would have been better for her to have had nursing care vs coming right home.

reviews.title: Benjamin Nathan-Serio
reviews.description: Professional, thorough and clearly highly skilled. Book your appointment early- this doctor is in high demand!Dr. Y ended almost ten years of discomfort in one fell swoop. Thank you Doctor!

reviews.title: vaagn k
reviews.description: One of the best doctors I have ever met. He answers all your questions works with you with all issues and is literally one of the best surgeons

reviews.title: Dub Tee
reviews.description: Dr yavrouian is simply the best,I cannot thank/ recommendhim enough!He is excellent incolorectal treatment,Butt (lol)he is also a kind,compassionate doctorAnd human being-He has helped my condition immenselyAnd I am so fortunate to have him as my doctor;Thank you Dr yavrouian!

reviews.title: Hilda Villarreal
reviews.description: Dr. Robert Yavrouian is an extraordinary and exceptional physician/surgeon! I am grateful for being blessed to have been referred to him for an extreme case of internal and external hemorrhoids. He assured himself (by performing a colonoscopy and rectal exams) first that hemorrhoids was my case and not other major issues. He was exremely caring, compassionate and professional! Thank you Dr. Yavrouian for your vision and courage on choosing to specialize in colorectal medicine! Not many of you out there!  I am completely in comfort thanks to you!

reviews.title: alex sarceno
reviews.description: I was not hapoy with him, he didnt onow how to proceed with my cancer and asked what tyoe of insurance i had. I saw him twice payed my co payment and at his LA clinic the girls took my payment, didnt give me a receipt and they are collecting my payment that i gave to them cash and they pocketed. Dislike them so much last rhing you need when you have cancer is keeping track of their job!

reviews.title: Grace Pabalan-Roque
reviews.description: Really had a good experience with him. Explaining details about the procedure. Dr. Yavrouian is Absolutely amazing!

reviews.title: Rob Y
reviews.description: Great doctor. Great office. 👌👍😃

reviews.title: Hovo deras
reviews.description: Fantastic doctor and surgeon, needed surgery, and everything went perfect. Thank you Dr Yavrouian.

reviews.title: ARTHUR LOPEZ
reviews.description: WOW...I'M SO VERY AMAZED HOW MUCH MY HEALTH HAS IMPROVED....THANKS TO DR.ROBERT YAVROUIAN & HIS MEDICAL TEAM! I WAS HAVING SERVER MEDICAL ISSUES....IN WHICH REQUIRED SURGERY! I WENT IN FOR SURGERY & EVERYTHING WAS VERY SUCCESSFUL! SO I WANTED TO RATE DR YAVROUIAN.... 5 STARS CUZ THIS IS ONE DOCTOR... WHO DESERVES TO BE RECOGNIZED FOR HIS CARENESS & INTERESTED ON CARING FOR HIS PATIENTS! THANK SO MUCH DOCTOR YAVROUIAN...CONTINUE TO HEAL THE ILL! I WISH YOU ALL THE BEST....IN YOUR SUCCESS! GOD BLESS YOU & TAKE CARE!RESPECTFUL: ARTHUR LOPEZ

reviews.title: Dr.tasneem Yacob
reviews.description: He is scientific  ,accurate in diagnosis and treatment.Full care of patient.

reviews.title: Ron Quijada
reviews.description: Doctor Yavrouian and his staff are great.

reviews.title: Gabriel valle
reviews.description: Very professional and very polite..

reviews.title: Edmond Jamgotchian
reviews.description: disorganized  doctor who gives  wrong  diagnostics
